page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL
page.content: An old building in Drumlanrig St. in Thornhill is the site of a mysterious apparition called "The Green Lady", because of her long green flowing dress. The building was built in 1714 as the Queensberry Arms Hotel using stones from an earlier building called the Red House which stood on the low road below Thornhill. Rumour claims that the Green Lady was the victim of some "dark deed" in the Red House, possibly murder, and her ghost then moved with the stones and timber of the house when they were moved to Drumlanrig Street. Most people who have lived in the house, including Australian soldiers billited there during the war, have claimed to have felt some presence. In 1947 the staircase, where most sightings occured, was removed but villagers swear they have seen her yet.
